DOC.brief_title: Study LJP 394 Lupus Patients With History Renal Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Systemic Lupus Erythematosus ( SLE ) Active SLE renal disease within past 4 year . Males females 12 70 year old . Females must nonpregnant nonlactating . Females male must use adequate birth control method course study . Ability weekly intravenous ( IV ) administration study treatment . Active SLE renal disease within past 3 month prior enter study . Use follow therapy within 3 month prior enter study : alkylating agent , e.g. , cyclophosphamide , TNF inhibitor , cyclosporine . Use mycophenolate mofetil exceed 1000 mg/day , azathioprine exceed 100 mg/day , methotrexate exceeds 10 mg/week , leflunomide exceed 10 mg/day within 2 month prior enter study . Use rituximab within 6 month prior enter study . Current abuse drug alcohol .
